title: Rebekah Vardy could earn thousands from WAG war with Coleen Rooney
text:

Rebekah Vardy's WAG war with furious Coleen Rooney could soon see her seriously cash in.

The bickering footballers' wives have been embroiled in an angry row after Coleen accused Rebekah of leaking stories about her to the press .

She played detective and exposed the partner of Leicester City frontman Jamie Vardy after her own Instagram investigation.

But Rebekah may be about to make a ton of money thanks to the social media site that caused her all these issues.

She has already added 49,000 Instragram followers since Coleen blamed her account for leaking secrets.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

That, according to the Daily Star, means Rebekah could now charge firms an extra £500 per ad post.

One social media expert who handles a host of high-profile clients said: “Becky could command around £1,500 to £2,000 per post before this row.

"Now that figure will be £2,000 to £2,500 and looks likely to go higher the longer this row rumbles on.

“The more followers she attracts the more she could earn from promoting products on her account.’’

Rebekah – who totally denies the allegation – now boasts 421,000 followers.

Coleen's pals have said she couldn't care less about the threat of legal action from her rival.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

A source told the Mail on Sunday: "Coleen’s view is 'Bring it on'.

"She has got the evidence – it’s all there.

"Coleen’s evidence is bulletproof and she stands by it all. If Rebekah wants to sue, she’s welcome to.

"Coleen will fight her and the proof is there. If it’s in court, it’s not ideal but Coleen will follow it through."
description: Rebekah Vardy has added 49,000 Instragram followers since Coleen Rooney blamed her Instagram account for leaking stories to the press
